ComicInfo.Series: Ghost Rider / Blaze: Spirits of Vengeance
ComicInfo.Title: Last Rites [Spirits of Venom Part 4]
ComicInfo.Summary: Last Rites [Spirits of Venom Part 4]: Venom attacks Ghost Rider because he helped Spider-Man get away from him but John rescues him. Clara Menninger has a vision of Eli and Miranda dead. The deathspawn capture Venom, Ghost Rider and John Blaze but Spider-Man rescues them before their life essence can be used to bring Deathwatch back to life. Everyone, including Venom is captured and John says it is time to get back to the carnival.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:44:59. [Issue ID 85598]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Spider-Man [Peter Parker],Troll],Demogoblin,Venom [Eddie Brock],Eli McIntyre,Deathspawn [Hag,Kodiak,Miranda Woods,Clara Menninger,Johnny Blaze,Ghost Rider [Danny Ketch],Hobgoblin [Jason Macendale],Deathwatch's body,Wolf,Guardsmen
